articles.author: Jacqueline Howard
articles.title: Tested positive for flu during the holidays? Here’s what you should do - CNN
articles.description: As millions of Americans hit the road or take to the skies for the holidays, another seasonal traveler is picking up speed: influenza.
articles.content:
As millions of Americans hit the road or take to the skies for the holidays, another seasonal traveler is picking up speed: influenza.
Flu activity is already rising across the country. In the week … [+6979 chars]
